Form

공통

  • [class="row"] row 별 요소 배치
  • row 당 최대 column 개수 : 4
  • [class='col-*'] : (column max : 12), column에 비례 [col-*] 클래스 숫자를 부여하여 컬럼 너비 적용
    ex) [class="col-1 ~ col-12"], 또는 [class="col"]
  • label + input 결합 시 => label(1) : input (1) 경우 동일 네이밍
    : ex) label for="userName" == input id="userName"
  • label + input 결합 시 => label(1) : input (n) 경우
    label for, input id 부여 X /
    각 input 태그 title 속성값 선언 input title='해당 인풋 요소에 대한 설명'
  • label for, input id 선언 시 퍼블리싱 소스의 속성값이나 공란에 대해 해당 항목에 따른 적절한 네이밍으로 수정하여 사용 필요
  • 샘플 페이지 : sample_input.html
  • form 입력/출력 형식 : 휴대폰, 전화번호, 생년월일 : 하이픈(-) 처리

INPUT

Input Text

<input type="text" class="c-input" value="text"> <input type="text" class="c-input" value="text" readonly="readonly">

Label + input Text

<div class="row"> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="code">고객사 코드<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="code"> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="code02">고객사 코드<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="code02"> </div> </div>

Label + input Text


일치합니다.

<div class="row c-input-pw-row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label for="partnerJoin02">PW<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="password" class="c-input" id="partnerJoin02"> </div> </div> <div class="row c-input-pw-row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label for="partnerJoin03" class="rechk-label">PW확인<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <div class="pw-rechk"> <input type="password" class="c-input" id="partnerJoin03"> <p class="c-input-info-txt">일치합니다.</p> <!-- <p class="c-input-info-txt is-error"> 일치하지 않습니다. </p> --> </div> </div> </div>

input Text Range

<div class="row c-input-group range"> <!-- for/id 변경 필수 --> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="range01">label</label> <div class="c-input-box"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="range01"> </div> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label for="range02">label</label> <div class="c-input-box"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="range02"> </div> </div> </div> <div class="row"> <!-- 각 input 태그 title 속성값 선언 input title='해당 인풋 요소에 대한 설명' --> <div class="col label-input"> <label class="c-label-txt">금액설정</label> <div class="row inner c-input-group range"> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <div class="c-input-date"> <input type="text" class="c-input" title=""> </div> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <div class="c-input-date"> <input type="text" class="c-input" title=""> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

Input Text

명
<div class="row"> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputName02">고객사명<i class="is-nec">필수입력</i></label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputName02" value="11442222" disabled> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputSearch">검색</label> <div class="c-input-search"> <input type="text" id="inputSearch"> <button type="button" class="btn-search"><span class="skip">검색</span></button> </div> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="inputText02">이름</label> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputText02" value="홍길동"> </div> <div class="col-3 label-input"> <label for="unit">검사대상인원</label> <div class="c-input-unit"> <input type="text" class="c-input" id="unit"> <span class="unit">명</span> </div> </div> </div>

Input Text + Button

<div class="c-input-btn-group"> <div class="col-11"><input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputBtn02" value="test"></div> <div class="col-1 input-button"> <div class="buttons"> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> </div> </div> </div> <div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label class="c-label-txt" for="inputBtn01">버튼</label> <div class="row inner c-input-btn-group"> <div class="col-10"><input type="text" class="c-input" id="inputBtn01" value="test"></div> <div class="col-2 input-button"> <div class="buttons"> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> <button class="c-btn bg-blue-1 input-btn"><span>검진추가</span></button> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

CHECKBOX

Checkbox

Checkbox + Label

<div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk01"> <label for="chk01" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>건강검진</span></label> </div>

Checkbox List

<div class="row"> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label>검진구분</label> <div class="c-m-input-list"> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk03_01"> <label for="chk03_01" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>종합검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk03_02"> <label for="chk03_02" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>건강검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk03_03"> <label for="chk03_03" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>건강검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk03_04"> <label for="chk03_04" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>건강검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> <div class="col-6 label-input"> <label>검진구분</label> <div class="c-m-input-list"> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk02_01"> <label for="chk02_01" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>종합검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> <div class="input-col"> <div class="inner"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk02_02"> <label for="chk02_02" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>건강검진</span></label> </div> </div> </div> <div class="input-col w-100"> <div class="c-multi-input-group"> <div class="c-chkbox"> <input type="checkbox" id="chk02_03"> <label for="chk02_03" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>회사지원</span></label> </div> <input type="text" class="c-input"> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>

RADIO

Radio

<div class="c-rdochk"> <input type="radio" id=""> <label for="" class="chk-label"><i></i><span class="skip">radio</span></label> </div>

Radio + Label

<div class="c-rdochk"> <input type="radio" id=""> <label for="" class="chk-label"><i></i><span>radio</span></label> </div>

TEXTAREA

textarea

<div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <label for="inpuTxtA01">textarea 입력</label> <div class="c-txtarea-field"> <textarea id="inpuTxtA01" class="c-txt-area"> </textarea> </div> </div> </div> /* + label 없이 단독 사용 시 textarea id 제거, title 속성 추가 */ <div class="row"> <div class="col label-input"> <div class="c-txtarea-field"> <textarea class="c-txt-area" title="내용 입력"> </textarea> </div> </div> </div>

SELECT

select basic

/* + label이 없는 select 태그의 경우 title 속성 추가하여 해당 목록을 설명할 수 있는 내용 입력 */ <div class="c-select"> <select title="항목 선택"> <option value="" selected="">직접입력</option> <option value="">option</option> <option value="">option</option> <option value="">option</option> </select> </div>

File

Input File

작업환경측정서
<div class="col label-input"> <div class="c-label-txt">작업환경측정서</div> <div class="c-input-file-group"> <input type="file" class="c-input-file" id="inputFile01"> <label class="c-file-label" for="inputFile01" tabindex="0">파일 선택</label> </div> </div>
